objects.name: _1_Description
objects.string: Splitting is done with the purpose of bringing the components of the footwear to the same thickness on their entire surface.

objects.name: _2_Description
objects.string: Skiving is the reduction in thickness of certain edges of upper in order to avoid discomfort in wear and reduce bulkiness.

objects.name: _3_Description
objects.string: Punching is performed on the edges or on the middle of the parts. Punches can have a decorative or functional / technological role (for example, for lacing, fastening the caps or closures, attaching ornamental accessories, etc).

objects.name: _4_Description
objects.string: The marking is an auxiliary operation which supposed to marking of the position of the holes or stitches. Also, the marking helps correctly fit the component parts when stitching.

objects.name: _5_Description
objects.string: The upper components, made from thin materials or with large elongations, require reinforcement. On the inside of the parts, reinforcement parts (intermediate lining) are made of cotton, knitted or nonwoven fabrics that have good tear resistance and adequate deformation capacity.

objects.name: _6_Description
objects.string: The folding operation  is done on the edges of the upper in the scope of their embellishment and reinforcement.
